task.title: Alive Day 12 Mission
task.body: Over the next few hours, shake up your routine by changing at least one way you go about your day. Did you learn anything about yourself?

followUp.title: Alive Day 12 Check-in
followUp.body: Time to check-in with your today’s mission!
